metadata.name: Suspicious File Download From IP Via Wget.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects potentially suspicious file downloads directly from IP addresses using Wget.exe

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\wget.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wget.exe') AND process.cmd_line rlike '://\[0-9\]\{1,3\}\\.\[0-9\]\{1,3\}\\.\[0-9\]\{1,3\}\\.\[0-9\]\{1,3\}' AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http')) AND process.cmd_line rlike '\\s-O\\s' AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('--output-document')) AND (endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ps1')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ps1''')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.ps1"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dat')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dat''')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dat"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.msi')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.msi''')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.msi"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bat')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bat''')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.bat"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe''')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.exe"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbs')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbs''')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbs"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbe')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbe''')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.vbe"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.hta')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.hta''')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.hta"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll''')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.dll"')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.psm1')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.psm1''')) OR endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('.psm1"'))))

output.summary: Detects potentially suspicious file downloads directly from IP addresses using Wget.exe
